name: Bargn
description: AI-powered discount membership platform offering 50% off at restaurants, bars, gyms, and spas in Helsinki. Smart spending made simple with personalized recommendations.

audience.audienceType: Consumers seeking lifestyle discounts and smart spending solutions

about.name: Discount Membership Platform
about.description: AI-powered platform connecting consumers with local businesses through 50% discount memberships

mainEntity.name: Consumer Discount Membership
mainEntity.description: AI-powered personalized discount recommendations for restaurants, bars, gyms, and spas

mainEntity.name: Business Partnership Platform
mainEntity.description: Zero-commission platform for businesses to attract new customers with 50% discounts

mainEntity.name: Creator Partnership Program
mainEntity.description: 40% revenue share program for content creators and influencers

itemListElement.name: Bars & Nightlife
itemListElement.description: 50% off at Helsinki bars and clubs

itemListElement.name: Fitness & Wellness
itemListElement.description: 50% off at gyms and fitness centers

itemListElement.name: Beauty & Spa
itemListElement.description: 50% off at spas and beauty salons

competitorComparison.name: ResQ Club
competitorComparison.description: Food waste reduction with surplus meals at 40-60% off. Limited to surplus food only.
competitorComparison.differentiatingFeature: Bargn offers full lifestyle categories (restaurants, bars, gyms, spas) with consistent 50% discount, not just surplus food.

competitorComparison.name: Too Good To Go
competitorComparison.description: Anti-food waste app with surprise bags at reduced prices. Random selection, food only.
competitorComparison.differentiatingFeature: Bargn lets you choose exactly what you want with AI-powered personalized recommendations across all lifestyle categories.

competitorComparison.name: Wolt+
competitorComparison.description: Delivery subscription with free delivery fees. ~€5/month. Delivery-focused only.
competitorComparison.differentiatingFeature: Bargn provides 50% off for in-venue experiences — restaurants, bars, gyms, spas — not just food delivery.

competitorComparison.name: S-Etukortti / K-Plussa
competitorComparison.description: Grocery store loyalty cards offering 1-5% cashback. Minimal savings on experiences.
competitorComparison.differentiatingFeature: Bargn offers 50% discount on lifestyle experiences, saving €150-300/month vs €5-20/month from loyalty cards.

keywords: AI discounts, Helsinki restaurants, membership app, 50% off, lifestyle savings, smart spending, restaurant deals, bar discounts, gym memberships, spa treatments, business partnerships, creator program, zero commission, revenue share, ResQ alternative, Wolt+ alternative, Helsinki deals
